entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump Really big rally? The CORONAVIRUS is so CONTAGIOUS that if JUST ONE attendant is carry it THOUSANDS could be at risk. MAGAts you might want to think about missing this event. They just cancelled the AutoShow in Europe.Why aren’t OUR health czars cancelling a Trump rally FFS?
